/*
     shubham_1286(shubham verma)
                                   */
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<deque>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<deque>
#include<bitset>
#include<utility>
#include<limits.h>
#include<sstream>
#define max(x,y) x>y?x:y
#define min(x,y) x<y?x:y
#define sd(a)  scanf("%d",&a);
#define slld(a)  scanf("%lld",&a);
#define sllu(a)  scanf("%llu",&a);
#define pd(a)  printf("%d\n",a);
#define plld(a)  printf("%lld\n",a);
#define pllu(a)  printf("%llu\n",a);
#define inf INT_MAX
#define low INT_MIN
#define mod 1000000009
#define ull unsigned long long
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

vector<int>in,in1;
vector<int>fl;
vector<int>::iterator it;
vector<int>::iterator rit;
float fa[100];
int pa[100],pa1[100],fa1[100];
int main()
{
// freopen("c:\\users\\verma\\desktop\\aa.txt","r",stdin);
  //freopen("c:\\users\\verma\\desktop\\out.txt","w",stdout);
  
int t;
sd(t);
for(int y=1;y<=t;y++)
{
    printf("Case %d:\n",y);
  in.clear();in1.clear();fl.clear(); 
int n,scen;
sd(n);sd(scen);
double k,z;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
    scanf("%lf",&k);
    if((k-(int)k)==0)
    in.push_back((int)k);
    else
        fl.push_back(floor(k*100+.5));
}
 

 
sort(in.begin(),in.end(),greater<int>());
sort(fl.begin(),fl.end(),greater<int>());
    
  
bool temp=true;
for(int h=1;h<=scen;h++)
{
    printf("Scenario %d:\n",h);  
  int u=0,v=0;   
  
scanf("%lf",&z);

 
int ff,xx;
double gg,FF,hh=0.0;
gg=modf(z,&FF);

//cout<<gg<<endl;
 xx=(int)FF;
 hh=(gg*100.00);
 
 ff=floor(hh+.5);
// cout<<hh<<endl;
  for(int i=0;i<100;i++)
{pa[i]=pa1[i]=0;fa[i]=fa1[i]=0;}


for(it=in.begin();it!=in.end();++it)
{
    if((*it)<=xx)
    {
        int temp=xx/(*it);
        xx-=temp*(*it);
         pa[u]=(*it);pa1[u]=temp;u++;
    //pa.push_back(make_pair((*it),temp));
    }
}
for(rit=fl.begin();rit!=fl.end();++rit)
{
//   cout<<ff<<" dd \n";
    if((*rit)<=ff)
    {
        
          int temp1=ff/(*rit);
     // cout<<ff<<"  "<<(*rit)<<" "<<temp1<<endl;  
          ff=ff-(temp1)*(*rit);
        
         fa[v]=(*rit);fa1[v]=temp1;v++;      
    }
}
     
  

  for(int i=0;i<u;i++)
 printf("%d %d\n",pa[i],pa1[i]);
 for(int i=0;i<v;i++)
 printf("%.2f %d\n",(fa[i]/100.00),fa1[i]);
/*for(pit=pa.begin();pit!=pa.end();++pit)
cout<<(*pit).first<<" "<<(*pit).second<<endl;
 
 
for(mit=fa.begin();mit!=fa.end();++mit)
cout<<(*mit).first<<" "<<(*mit).second<<endl;
 
 
pa.clear();
fa.clear();*/
 
}
 

}
 // system("pause");
 }
